txt.en: A terrible wind has come from Angmar, bringing with it a freezing winter.

'Have you seen the hunters and warriors of our people? They survive for long stretches out in the wilderness because of the warm clothing that they wear.

'One of the sturdiest hides is that of the Peikko. Their hides are warm and provide protection from wind, water, and ice. If we are to have a warmer winter, then we must have more Peikko hides!

'The Peikko often live north of Sûri-kylä. Bring me their hides, and I will find you a suitable reward.'
Peikko can be found north of Sûri-kylä.\n\nNôra has asked you to collect Peikko hides to help supplement the bear-furs you collected for her already.
'These are excellent hides, [placeholder]. I am pleased that you were able to obtain them with such ease.'
Nôra is at Sûri-kylä, south from where you found the Peikko.\n\nYou should return to Nôra with the hides you collected.
'Have you found Peikko yet? They can be found north of Sûri-kylä.'
'I am pleased that you were able to obtain these hides with such ease, [placeholder].'
